data.claim:
MASTERWORK DESIGN REFERENCES - Curated list for deep study:

**MINIMAL/SAAS (Dark):**
1. Linear.app - Masterclass in minimalism, dark UI, purposeful motion
2. Glide - Dark hero, high-contrast CTAs, conversion-focused
3. Vercel.com - Developer-focused, gradient accents, clean hierarchy

**CREATIVE STUDIOS:**
4. Lusion.co - Experimental 3D, immersive interactions, award-winning
5. Samsy.ninja (SMSY) - 50+ awards, computational design, bold experimental
6. Sublimio.com - Gorgeous section transitions, white smoke backgrounds

**BOLD TYPOGRAPHY:**
7. Hourly-app.com - Vintage-inspired, beige/red on black, retro confidence
8. RNO1 - Futuristic, bold type with 3D motion
9. Monolith - Oversized type dominating screen, powerful minimal

**GEOMETRIC/SHAPES:**
10. Play (createwithplay.com) - Mobile-first, product demos with overlays
11. Cone.app - Interactive header background, color picker product demo

**BENTO/GRID:**
12. Apple.com - Master of minimal, perfect spacing, product hero
13. Stripe.com - Gradient mastery, layered depth, polished details

**DARK CINEMATIC:**
14. Destroyer.la - Parallax, scattered menu, Space Invaders game
15. Genesis (eatgenesis.com) - Illustrated, animated characters, unforgettable
